name: d2-rune-tools
description: A small site to hold and view runes and runeword information

scripts.dev: npm run clean && parcel build --dist-dir docs && cp -r src/images docs/images && npx http-server docs
scripts.build: npm run clean && parcel build --dist-dir docs --public-url https://runewords.codinglogan.dev/ && cp -r src/images docs/images
scripts.clean: npm run remove-docs & npm run remove-cache

author: codingLogan
